channel.title: [PI] Site opens at login
channel.description:
Hello,
I've lately downloaded a server and I have a lil problem I never experienced before...
Always when I log in, it makes my main internet browser open a website (it was the main site of the server). I really find that annoying because i have a really slow pc and it lags ALOT!
[b]What I've found out so far:[/b] - I managed to change the site. how? changing it in this code: [code] getPA().sendFrame126("Website & Forum", 29163); //2nd section title getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 29164); //2nd section content } [/code] This is a code that show the lines in the quest tab. so I think it must be something that reads that line and go to there...
Hope someone can help...

item.title: [PI] Site opens at login
item.dc:creator: @sarranoob sarranoob
item.description:
@sarranoob wrote:

Hello,

I’ve lately downloaded a server and I have a lil problem I never experienced before…

Always when I log in, it makes my main internet browser open a website (it was the main site of the server).
I really find that annoying because i have a really slow pc and it lags ALOT!

What I’ve found out so far:

  • I managed to change the site. how? changing it in this code:
getPA().sendFrame126("Website & Forum", 29163); //2nd section title
		getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 29164); //2nd section content
	}

This is a code that show the lines in the quest tab. so I think it must be something that reads that line and go to there…

Hope someone can help…

Read full topic
